memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t channel, uint8_t pdm, enum pdm_lr lr)
memberdef.name: dmic_build_channel_map

detaileddescription.para: Build the channel map to populate struct pdm_chan_cfg
Returns the map of PDM controller and LEFT/RIGHT channel shifted to the bit position corresponding to the input logical channel value

parameterdescription.para: LEFT/RIGHT channel within the chosen PDM hardware controller

simplesect.para: Bit-map containing the PDM and L/R channel information

memberdef.argsstring: (uint32_t channel_map_lo, uint32_t channel_map_hi, uint8_t channel, uint8_t *pdm, enum pdm_lr *lr)
memberdef.name: dmic_parse_channel_map

detaileddescription.para: Helper function to parse the channel map in pdm_chan_cfg
Returns the PDM controller and LEFT/RIGHT channel corresponding to the channel map and the logical channel provided as input

parameterdescription.para: Lower order/significant bits of the channel map
Higher order/significant bits of the channel map
Pointer to the PDM hardware controller number
Pointer to the LEFT/RIGHT channel within the PDM controller

detaileddescription.para: Build a bit map of clock skew values for each PDM channel
Returns the bit-map of clock skew value shifted to the bit position corresponding to the input PDM controller value

parameterdescription.para: The skew to apply for the clock output from the PDM controller

simplesect.para: Bit-map containing the clock skew information

detaileddescription.para: Configure the DMIC driver and controller(s)
Configures the DMIC driver device according to the number of channels, channel mapping, PDM I/O configuration, PCM stream configuration, etc.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device structure for DMIC driver instance
Pointer to the structure containing the DMIC configuration

simplesect.para: 0 on success, a negative error code on failure

detaileddescription.para: Send a command to the DMIC driver
Sends a command to the driver to perform a specific action

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device structure for DMIC driver instance
The command to be sent to the driver instance

simplesect.para: 0 on success, a negative error code on failure

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev, uint8_t stream, void **buffer, size_t *size, int32_t timeout)
memberdef.name: dmic_read

detaileddescription.para: Read received decimated PCM data stream
Optionally waits for audio to be received and provides the received audio buffer from the requested stream

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the device structure for DMIC driver instance
Pointer to the received buffer address
Pointer to the received buffer size
Timeout in milliseconds to wait in case audio is not yet received, or SYS_FOREVER_MS

simplesect.para: 0 on success, a negative error code on failure

briefdescription.para: Public API header file for Digital Microphones.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains the Digital Microphone APIs
